mixed-citation.article-title: Seven new giant pill-millipede species and numerous new records of the genus Zoosphaerium from Madagascar (Diplopoda, Sphaerotheriida, Arthrosphaeridae)

tp:treatment-sec.p: See Wesener & Wägele (2008) for a revision and Wesener (2016) for a complete bibliography.
